name: Pipe Dream Clone
description:
My first Unity project where I wanted to finish something from a bare-bones idea.  Based everything off of what I remembered was in the NES Pipe Dream game and made a clone.  Tons of features I could add, and maybe I will, but for now could consider this as close to a "beta" as I am willing go.

Pipe Dream Clone Instructions

Goal:  

Reach the required distance (DIST) of filled pipes by creating a connected line of pipes from the starting pipe.  Timer (on the left) doesn't start until the clear starting pipe is placed.

Instructions included in .zip file.

Notes:
- High score is only saved when you beat a level.
- Next pipe comes out from bottom of the stack of upcoming pipes.
- Speed increases (slowly) with each level, as does distance.
- Guess this would be a "beta" version so still some bugs in but I'd like to move on to other projects.  Might return to rebalance some things.
